statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ 5 \\ 5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -10 \\ 7 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -14 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ 3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -4 \\ 5 \\ 5 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -10 \\ 7 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -14 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
